def left(s):
	s = s[-1]+s[:-1]
	s = s.lstrip('0')
	return s

def right(s):
	s = s[1:]+s[0]
	s = s.lstrip('0')
	return s

ntc = int(raw_input())
while ntc :
	n = raw_input()
	maxVal = max(int(left(right(n))),int(right(left(n))))
	tmp = n[:]
	for i in range(len(n)) :
		tmp = left(tmp)
		maxVal = max(maxVal,int(tmp))

	tmp = n[:]
	for i in range(len(n)) :
		tmp = right(tmp)
		maxVal = max(maxVal,int(tmp))

	print maxVal

	ntc-=1
